page.description: Your Alpha Anywhere subscription status can be checked using your license number.

description.p: To check the subscription status of your Alpha Anywhere product can be verified online using Alpha Software's subscrition verificaiton tool. This tool is available at *[extlink:http://activation.alphasoftware.com/subscriptionStatus.aspx]*.
You can also verify the subscription status from within Alpha Anywhere in the *[ui:About Alpha Anywere]* dialog (found under the *[ui:Help]* menu.)

step.description: Under the *[ui:Help]* menu, click *[ui:About Alpha Anywhere...]*.

In the *[ui:About Alpha Anywhere]* dialog, click the *[ui:Click to show information]* link located next to "Subscription Info:". Clicking this link will open your default web browser and automatically check your subscription information for your Alpha Anyhwere license.

section.title: Verifying Multiple Licenses
section.description: If you have more than one license number registered with your installation of Alpha Anyhwere, you will need to check each license number individually. Licenses are listed in the *[ui:Settings]* dialog under *[ui:System]* > *[ui:License]*. You can access the *[ui:Settings]* dialog from the *[ui:View]* menu.

figure.title: Licenses listed in the Settings Dialog

section.description: If you find any issues with your licesnse information, follow the instructions on the website, *[extlink:http://server.alphasoftware.com/license-management-inquiry]*.
